mapper.insert: insert into order_t ( order_id, user_id, shifts_record_id, order_amount, order_status, create_time, create_by, last_update_time, last_update_by ) values ( #{orderId}, #{userId}, #{shiftsRecordId}, #{orderAmount}, #{orderStatus}, now(), #{createBy}, now(), #{lastUpdateBy} )
mapper.update: update order_t set order_status = #{status}, last_update_time = now(), last_update_by = -1 where order_id = #{orderId}
